item.title: Roonscape - The RS2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:101, topic:428324”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=531014.msg3878936#msg3878936 date=1325876058]
The appearance interface shouldn’t be shown upon login of the server. It should be from the make-over mage at varrock.
[/quote]Lol dude learn your shit, it’s always been shown when you first create your account throughout all of Runescape’s history… and makeover mage is in falador lol.[/quote]
guess my post when moderated didnt show…

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:27, topic:428324”][quote author=zerak93 link=topic=531014.msg3879727#msg3879727 date=1325954817]

The appearance interface shouldn’t be shown upon login of the server. It should be from the make-over mage at varrock.

That interface is only comming when you log in for the first time… The make-over at Falador is another thing, just for the skin.

It shouldn’t pop up at first though… i dont think rs had it like that…

It had…
[/quote]
Nvm just watched a vid lol[/quote]

oh dude learn to scroll

Read full topic

item.title: Roonscape - The RS2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:91, topic:428324”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=531014.msg3883931#msg3883931 date=1326286969]

Holy crap. Just shut up. All of you. First off, Team_Rocket is no god, and I’m sick of all the ego around the forums right now. It’s even more sad that you take your issues to skype or whatever, then post them here too? Really? I’m not going to delete your posts… but cmon guys, let’s try to get over this, ok?

Thanks, I offered to apologize many times.
[/quote]No offense, but ‘offering’ to apologize means absolutely nothing, how about just do it then move on…[/quote]

Whatever you say. I’m going to stop responding to this thread completely now. Also, I’m a God, everyone knows that. No hard feelings?

Read full topic

[/quote]

Thanks, I offered to apologize many times.[/quote]No offense, but ‘offering’ to apologize means absolutely nothing, how about just do it then move on…

item.title: Roonscape - The RS2006 Remake
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Guys cut it out, I just said you should bump every two weeks because nothing important happens EVERY SINGLE DAY. People don’t want to see ‘BUMP!!!’ ‘well this looks nice’ ‘BUMP!!!’ ‘coming along nicely’ ‘BUMP!!!’, it is very annoying. Sure you can post whenever you want but i was making a suggestion, also the owner of the thread can say things like ‘Added an important update’ to bump the topic.

Read full topic
